title: Find a Cure
tags: how to unlock find a cure
content:
g the first option will make Astarion suspicious of you as he says he saw you get out of the ship of the mind flayers, before being interrupted by the worms in your brains. He asks what happened, and you will have to choose from these options:

It's the mind flayer's worm - it connected us. Honestly? I have no idea. Put the knife away and I'll tell you everything.

Choosing the first option will make Astarion calm down and get ahold of the situation. He then apologizes, you now have three dialog
